plugin.name: FT2_portal
plugin.author: Khrysis
plugin.purpose: To help rerun the goal from Red Riding Hood
plugin.description:
-----Mapper Goto locations---------> mapper goto 1258 = buy chocolate (1 per run) mapper goto 32598 = buy dirk (1 per run) mapper goto 30531 = buy heart (only need one because keeps giving it back) mapper goto 49335 = buy hat (1 per run) mapper goto 1246 = kill silver for wish (1 per run) mapper goto 30823 = kill musician for lute or cast 'major creation lute 2.lute 3.lute mapper goto 23751 = to get rutabaga for sex change (buy 4) (usually get a lot of them because going female or male isnt guarantee)
-----Show this help file-----------> ft2 help = to see this help file
-----Toggle plugin on/off----------> ft2 on/off
-----Movement Aliases--------------> align = goes to area to change alignment feather = goes to part of goal to start the phoenix feather part royal pardon = goes to part of goal start royal pardon ft2goal = goes to Red Riding Hood starting room charm = goes to troll's charm starting room thirdpig = goes back to the third pig from teleport he does when giving brick stew = adds items to stew for you hag = goes to room with the old hag hood = runs to next room after getting hood golden egg = goes to Golden egg starting room beans = goes directions to room with harp weasel = goes to the weasel go one eye = goes to one eye
-----Phrase Aliases---------------> one eye = says the phrase for you three eye = says the phrase for you eyes = says the phrase for you teeth = says the phrase for you

trigger.match: You receive an evil curse from an evil faerie.
trigger.send: remove wielded wear curse run se

trigger.match: You get a thumb from the * corpse of a midwife.
You receive a royal ring from the princess.
You receive a peacock fan from a swan.
You receive a magical basket from One-Eye.
You receive a bridle from a pimp.
You get a magic bean from the * corpse of a magic bean.
Who are the Kaschei's cook's favorite performers?
trigger.send: say Little Billy and the Bootleg Bowlers

trigger.match: You receive a carrot from the mother rabbit.
You receive Prince Charming's eyes from a hedge of thorns.
You get a box of matches from the * corpse of the matchgirl.
You receive a thumb from the miller's wife.
You receive a pork chop from a brick seller.
You receive a mermaid's tongue from an old hag.
You receive a ruby necklace from the princess.
You receive a magical tablecloth from Three-Eye.
You receive a bundle of flax from a horse.
You get a one-sleeved tunic from the * corpse of the princess.
You deftly steal a thumb from a midwife.
You receive a wolf nose from Grandmother.
You receive a red riding hood from Little Red Riding Hood.
You receive a pair of wolf eyes from Grandmother.
You receive a golden crown from Prince Thrushbeard.
You receive a bowl of pork stew from the big bad wolf.
You get a thorn from the * corpse of an evil faerie.
You get a ham hock from the * corpse of the first little pig.
You receive a wishing star from an old hag.
You receive a pork chop from the second little pig.
You receive a night pass from the evil mother.
You receive a golden apple from Prince Charming.
You receive a basket of treats from Mrs. Riding Hood.
You get a suit of nothing.
You get a goat's heart from the * corpse of a magical goat.
The second little pig drops a map to the stick house.
Susie Rabbit drops Susie's heart.
Prince Charming drops lip balm.
A wood seller drops a bundle of sticks.
A wolf drops a pair of leather boots.
trigger.send: get boots wear boots wear hood n

trigger.match: A straw seller drops a bundle of straw.
A phoenix drops a phoenix feather.
A midwife drops a birth certificate.
A bean salesman asks, "That's a mighty fine cow, kid, don't suppose you'd be thinking about selling it?"
You receive baby back ribs from the third little pig.
What song does the harp play?
Who is Toto?
What was the name of the king's daughter in Puss'N'Boots?
What line of work did the giant want to go into?
Who does Little Red Riding Hood's mother remind you of?
What the hell is flax?
trigger.send: say it sounds like something to help when you're constipated, or a fantastic new weight loss solution

trigger.match: What kind of seeds does the golden apple have?
Who is the Dowager Duchess of Clairbourne?
Where was the golden charm made?
What size is the swan's brain?
trigger.send: say rivals the size of the pea

trigger.match: Who is Westron?
What would you call a raging forest inferno?
What metal were the rings and bit of Greatheart's bridle made from?
What is your niece's name?
What is the name of the princess in Two-Eye?
What is the name of the mermaid's prince's boyfriend?
What is the name of the farmer?
What is the name of Two-Eyes?
What is the name of Sleeping Beauty's father?
What is the first thing the miller's wife wished for?
trigger.send: say I wish for a counter that magically cleaned itself! say I wish...I wish...

trigger.match: What is the evil faerie's occupation?
What in the hell is flax?
trigger.send: say it sounds like something to help when you're constipated, or a fantastic new weight loss solution

trigger.match: What group does Sleeping Beauty join?
trigger.send: say the League of Women Boaters

trigger.match: What does the tattoo on the third little pig say?
What does the sea hag wear around her neck?
What does the Tzar order his guards to do?
What does jack call his mother?
trigger.send: say hag or shortsighted, overbearing, overdressed, manipulating witch!

trigger.match: What do the runes on the first side of the silver sword say?
What did you do to a child in kerofk when you were 16?
trigger.send: say hunted him down and chopped off his arm

trigger.match: What did tom thumb do when he was five years old?
trigger.send: say kill robbers kill bandits defeat robbers defeat bandits

trigger.match: What did alice do?
trigger.send: say Tripped in a rabbit hole and broke her foot

trigger.match: What country does queen lativia rule?
What color were the emperor's suede boots?
What color hair does Tzar Ivan have?
What color dress does the giant's wife wear?
What animal formed Beauty's cloak clasp?
How many eyes did Two-Eye's mother have?
How many brothers did the swan-queen have?
A small faerie says, "Your next task is to get the golden carrot award."
A small faerie says, "Your next task is to get the Emperor's not so invisible scepter."
A small faerie says, "Your next task is to get a phoenix feather."
A small faerie says, "Your next task is to get a bowl of savory pork stew."
A small faerie says, "Your next task is to get Sleeping Beauty's kiss."
A small faerie says, "Your next task is to find the royal bracers."

alias.send: say my,what big eyes run es
open stew put ham stew put chop stew put rib stew close stew
say little goat bleat, give me something good to eat

if ("%1") == ("on") then EnableTriggerGroup("ft2", true) EnableAliasGroup("ft2", true) ColourNote ("blue","red", "FT2 is enabled!") enabled=1
elseif ("%1") == ("off") then EnableTriggerGroup("ft2", false) EnableAliasGroup("ft2", false) ColourNote ("blue","red", "FT2 is disabled!") enabled=0 end

muclient.script:
function OnHelp () world.Note (world.GetPluginInfo (world.GetPluginID (), 3)) end
function OnPluginInstall () ColourNote ("blue","yellow","FT2 Plugin Installed! Type ft2 help - to show help Plugin is Disabled by default.") EnableTriggerGroup("ft2",false) EnableAliasGroup("ft2",false) enabled=0 end
require "gmcphelper"
function OnPluginBroadcast(msg, id, name, text) if (enabled ~= nil and enabled == 0) then return end if (id == "3e7dedbe37e44942dd46d264") then -- Check if this broadcast is by gmcp handler if (text == "room.info") then -- Get MyID and send note when in specific room MyID = tonumber(gmcp("room.info.num")) if MyID == 26762 then ColourNote ("blue","yellow","Must be female...check ft2 help for rutabaga location...Hood is random drop") ColourNote ("blue","red","Check ft2 help..You will need hat, dirk, wish, chocolate cake, and rutabaga to start") elseif MyID == 26758 then ColourNote ("blue","yellow","If no basket go South North til you get it") ColourNote ("blue","red","Type hood for alias after you get basket") elseif MyID == 26760 then ColourNote ("blue","yellow","Kill all but one wolf..Then give map to wolf") elseif MyID == 26761 then ColourNote ("blue","yellow","Type eyes for alias for the phrase") elseif MyID == 26763 then ColourNote ("blue","yellow","Type teeth for alias for the phrase and to trigger fight") ColourNote ("blue","red","Type charm for alias to go next task") elseif MyID == 26818 then ColourNote ("blue","yellow","Put your boots and helm back on..Kill Gruff then north..The Gruff's you kill have to be dead for you to get items from trolls north of them..If area repops while doing this make sure previous Gruff's are dead to get items from the next one etc.") elseif MyID == 26819 then ColourNote ("blue","yellow","If you get the chunk of goat meat go North..If not go South North til you do") elseif MyID == 26820 then ColourNote ("blue","yellow","Kill Gruff again then North") elseif MyID == 26821 then ColourNote ("blue","yellow","If you get goat skin go North..If not go South North til you do") elseif MyID == 26822 then ColourNote ("blue","yellow","Kill Gruff then North") elseif MyID == 26823 then ColourNote ("blue","yellow","All Gruff's have to be dead for troll to trigger..Go South then North if doesn't trigger") ColourNote ("blue","red","Type golden egg for alias to next task") elseif MyID == 26765 then ColourNote ("blue","yellow","Put your eyes item back on..Then continue") ColourNote ("blue","yellow","Pat cow then go South..May have to go North then South to trigger salesman") elseif MyID == 26766 then ColourNote ("blue","yellow","Type beans for alias to move on") elseif MyID == 26769 then ColourNote ("blue","yellow","Get harp then go West") elseif MyID == 26770 then ColourNote ("blue","yellow","Go west") elseif MyID == 26771 then ColourNote ("blue","yellow","Give goose jack..Keep trying he disappears and reappears if you are not fast enough") elseif MyID == 26772 then ColourNote ("blue","yellow","Kill faerie for thorn") elseif MyID == 26775 then ColourNote ("blue","yellow","Give thorn faerie") elseif MyID == 26777 then ColourNote ("blue","yellow","Kill all thorns..Last thorn will give eyes..Make sure nothing but thorns are there when you kill last thorn") elseif MyID == 26779 then ColourNote ("blue","yellow","Give eyes charming") elseif MyID == 26776 then ColourNote ("blue","yellow","Quaff balm") elseif MyID == 26814 then ColourNote ("blue","yellow","Put weapon back on..give chocolate pudgy..Give 50000 gold thin") elseif MyID == 26816 then ColourNote ("blue","yellow","Staunt emperor") ColourNote ("blue","red","Type go one eye for alias to go next part") elseif MyID == 26789 then ColourNote ("blue","yellow","Put your armor and neck item back on..Then type goat for alias") elseif MyID == 26787 then ColourNote ("blue","yellow","Type one eye for alias") elseif MyID == 26788 then ColourNote ("blue","yellow","Type three eye for alias") elseif MyID == 26791 then ColourNote ("blue","yellow","Type heart for alias") elseif MyID == 26793 then ColourNote ("blue","yellow","Give wish wife") elseif MyID == 26794 then ColourNote ("blue","yellow","Give thumb midwife..Steal it back or kill if your must..If you have to kill run w2n") elseif MyID == 26797 then ColourNote ("blue","yellow","Give dirk tom") elseif MyID == 26751 then ColourNote ("blue","yellow","Put your neck and ring back on..Give 10000 gold straw") elseif MyID == 26752 then ColourNote ("blue","yellow","Give straw pig..Kill pig for ham hock..Random drop") elseif MyID == 26753 then ColourNote ("blue","yellow","Give lute wood or major create it and give to wood..ft2 help for more info") elseif MyID == 26754 then ColourNote ("blue","yellow","Give sticks pig..Kill pig for pork chop..Random drop") elseif MyID == 26755 then ColourNote ("blue","yellow","Kill brick while wearing sword") elseif MyID == 26756 then ColourNote ("blue","yellow","Put back on normal weapons..Give brick pig..Kill pig when you get back from teleport for ribs..Random drop") elseif MyID == 26698 then ColourNote ("blue","yellow","Type thirdpig for alias to get back to third pig") elseif MyID == 26757 then ColourNote ("blue","yellow","Type stew for alias..Make sure your have ribs, chop, ham") elseif MyID == 26807 then ColourNote ("blue","yellow","Kill 5.swan 4.swan etc til one swan is left then follow swan") elseif MyID == 26808 then ColourNote ("blue","yellow","Say speak to me to trigger fight") elseif MyID == 26812 then ColourNote ("blue","yellow","Give tunic mother..Then make sure your are neutral before going on") ColourNote ("blue","red","Type align for alias if you need to go neutral..If not type royal pardon for alias") elseif MyID == 34401 then ColourNote ("blue","yellow","If on Royal Pardon part go neutral..Alias royal pardon after") ColourNote ("blue","red","If on Phoenix feather part go good..1260 align..Then type feather for alias") elseif MyID == 26799 then ColourNote ("blue","yellow","Spropose princess") elseif MyID == 26801 then ColourNote ("blue","yellow","If you are female remove crown...Give 10000 gold princess..Kill horse") elseif MyID == 26802 then ColourNote ("blue","yellow","Give flax princess") elseif MyID == 26804 then ColourNote ("blue","yellow","Give ruby princess") elseif MyID == 26817 then ColourNote ("blue","yellow","Put helm and ring back on..Kill gardener..Make sure look sign for instructions after gardener is dead..You need to find the room that has the magic bean in it..Say look twice to see the room the first time..Once you find the bean say pick veggie til you fight it..If too slow the bean can move rooms") elseif MyID == 26833 then ColourNote ("blue","yellow","Give 50000 gold mother") elseif MyID == 26840 then ColourNote ("blue","yellow","Give carrot susie..Give heart peter") elseif MyID == 26847 then ColourNote ("blue","yellow","Type fstar") elseif MyID == 26848 then ColourNote ("blue","yellow","Type hag for alias") elseif MyID == 26864 then ColourNote ("blue","yellow","Give hat hag") ColourNote ("blue","red","On return give ring hag") elseif MyID == 26835 then ColourNote ("blue","yellow","Give heart foam") ColourNote ("blue","red","After fight type hag again for alias") elseif MyID == 26868 then ColourNote ("blue","yellow","Give star sea king") elseif MyID == 26672 then ColourNote ("blue","yellow","You need to be good..Make sure around 1260 for next part") ColourNote ("blue","red","Type align for alias..If rerunning again..Type ft2goal") elseif MyID == 26780 then ColourNote ("blue","yellow","Give 10000 gold mother") elseif MyID == 26782 then ColourNote ("blue","yellow","Kill all but one pimp..Give the pass to the last one") elseif MyID == 26783 then ColourNote ("blue","yellow","Kill matchgirl") elseif MyID == 26785 then ColourNote ("blue","yellow","Kill phoenix") ColourNote ("blue","red","Type weasel for alias after phoenix") elseif MyID == 26871 then ColourNote ("blue","yellow","Give feather weasel for Seelie Courts") ColourNote ("blue","red","If he is singing wait til done before giving feather") elseif MyID == 26869 then ColourNote ("blue","yellow","Nod banshee to start questions..You have limited time to answer..Not all are correct..BE READY TO GUESS IF ONE IS WRONG") elseif MyID == 26870 then ColourNote ("blue","yellow","Wear staff..Brandish staff for next question") elseif MyID == 26845 then ColourNote ("blue","yellow","Last question..Make sure only to say riddle for the last question when the lady if female or lord if male has the portal") end end end end
